Package de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.forms

Provides Rule implementations focusing on accessible forms and their accessibility.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AlternativeTextForImageButtonRule AlternativeTextForImageButtonRule ensures that every image button created through <input type="image"/> within the given HTML document provides an alternative text through it's alt attribute.
FieldsetContainsLegendRule FieldsetContainsLegendRule ensures that every <fieldset/> within the given HTML document contains a <legend/> tag as the first child element to describe the elements grouped by this <fieldset/>.
LabelContainsTextRule LabelContainsTextRule ensures that every <label/> within the given HTML document contains a textual representation for the given label.
LabelForInputFieldRule LabelForInputFieldRule ensures that every <input/> field of type text or password within the given HTML document is associated with a <label/> element that references the <input/> element through its for attribute.
LabelForSelectTagRule LabelForInputFieldRule ensures that every <select/> tag within the given HTML document is associated with a <label/> element that references the <select/> tag through its for attribute.
LabelForTextareaRule LabelForTextareaRule ensures that every <textarea/> within the given HTML document is associated with a <label/> element that references the <textarea/> element through its for attribute.
LabelWithoutFormElementRule LabelWithoutFormElementRule ensures that every <label/> tag within the given HTML document is referencing a valid form element.
UniqueLabelForFormElementRule UniqueLabelForFormElementRule ensures that there is never more than one <label/> with the same value in its for attribute.
 

Package de.codescape.bitvunit.rule.forms Description

Provides Rule implementations focusing on accessible forms and their accessibility.
